metadata.title: GORE WEAR Men's C3 Thermo Jersey
features: Warm men's jersey, Ideal for cold weather conditions
Active Fit for comfortable freedom of movement, Cycling-specific cut
GORE Selected Fabrics: Fast moisture wicking and extreme breathability
3-compartment back pocket, Thermo-stretch functional material, Elastic grip at waistband for secure fit and coverage
GORE C3 Thermo Jersey, Size: XXL, Color: Neon Yellow, 100647
description: Fleece lined thermal jersey for cold weather cycling. Cut to fit your riding position, this cozy jersey can be worn as an outer layer or a mid-layer under a shell jacket for extra warmth. Logos are reflective for night time visibility. A wardrobe essential for anyone riding in cool temperatures.
